Definition.WordDefinition: HOURI, n. A comely female inhabiting the Mohammedan Paradise to make things cheery for the good Mussulman, whose belief in her existence marks a noble discontent with his earthly spouse, whom he denies a soul. By that good lady the Houris are said to be held in deficient esteem.

Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Houri \Hou"ri\, n.; pl. {Houris}. [Per. h[=u]r[=i], h[=u]r[=a], h[=u]r; akin to Ar. h[=u]r, pl. of ahwar beautiful-eyed, black-eyed.] A nymph of paradise; -- so called by the Mohammedans. [1913 Webster]
houri n 1: a voluptuously beautiful young woman [syn: {nymph}] 2: (Islam) one of the dark-eyed virgins of perfect beauty believed to live with the blessed in Paradise
